name: Clash Coda
description:
Tutorial: Click on a blue icon to select it.  Drag it on to the player to use it.

Shields will block some damage for you.

Objective: Move to the right, get in range of the boss, and defeat it.

GMTK 21 Game Jam Submission

Made in 48 Hrs with the theme of Joined together.

You and the mouse are joined together and must work as one, to destroy the alternate evil version of yourself. I guess you could say all 3 of you are Joined together really. Mechanically you join items to the player to move and shield him during combat.
